sources.styles\\navbar.sass:
.nav
   width: 100%
   position: sticky
   display: flex
   align-items: center
   justify-content: space-between
   // box-shadow: 0px 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)
   &__logo
      font-size: spacing(3)
      // margin: 20px 0
      margin: 40px 0
      span 
         color: $primaryPink
   &__links
      display: none
      list-style-type: none
      margin: 0
      padding: 0
      li
         font-size: 18px
         margin-left: 64px
         cursor: pointer
         color: rgba(27, 14, 25, 0.48)
         transition: color .5s
      li:last-child
         margin-right: spacing(8)
      li:hover
         color: $primaryPink
         
@include useMinWidth(660px)
   .nav
      &__links
         display: flex
sources.styles\\presentation.sass:
.presentation
   display: grid
   grid-template-columns: 1fr
   grid-template-areas: 'body' 'links'
   justify-content: center
   &__body
      grid-area: body
      justify-self: center
   &__desc
      font-size: 14px
      line-height: 133.8%
      color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.53)
      margin: spacing(4) 0
   &__header
      font-size: 26px
      line-height: 36px
   img 
      display: none
      grid-area: img
      width: 100%
      min-width: 200px
      max-width: 320px
   &__links
      grid-area: links
      justify-self: end
      margin-top: spacing(4)
      margin-right: spacing(4)
   &__btn
      width: 114px
      height: 52px
      @include primaryButton
   .presentation--pink
      color: $primaryPink

@include useMinWidth(500px)
   .presentation
      padding: spacing(5) spacing(10)
      grid-template-columns: 450px
      grid-template-areas: 'body' 'links'
      &__header
         font-size: 46px
         line-height: 55px
      &__desc   
         font-size: 18px
         line-height: 133.8%
      &__body
         margin-right: spacing(6)

@include useMinWidth(700px)
    .presentation
      grid-template-columns: 560px

@include useMinWidth(990px)
   .presentation
      grid-template-columns: 600px minmax(100px, 400px) minmax(1px, 1fr)
      grid-template-areas: 'body img .' '. . links'
      img
         display: block
sources.styles\\buttonAnim.sass:
$primaryButtonRadius: 9px

@mixin primaryButton()
   cursor: pointer
   outline: none
   border: none
   border-radius: $primaryButtonRadius
   color: white
   position: relative
   background: #7F00FF
   background: -webkit-linear-gradient(to left, #E100FF, #7F00FF)
   background: linear-gradient(to left, #E100FF, #7F00FF)
   z-index: 0
   &::before
      content: ''
      z-index: -1
      background: white
      border-radius: $primaryButtonRadius
      top: -1px
      left: -2px
      position: absolute
      width: calc(100% + 2px)
      height: calc(100% + 2px)
      transform: scaleX(0)
      transition: transform 500ms
      box-shadow: 0 0 1px 0 #7F00FF inset, 0 0 1px 0 #7F00FF
      transform-origin: 0 0
      transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.51,1.58,.41,.7)
   &:hover::before
      transform: scaleX(1)
      border: 1px solid #7F00FF
   &:hover
      color: rgba(0,0,0,0.87)
      font-weight: bold
sources.styles\\glory.sass:
.glory
   background: #EDEDED
   display: grid
   margin-top: spacing(8)
   grid-gap: 80px
   padding: spacing(8) 0
   text-transform: uppercase
   white-space: nowrap
   &__desc
      font-size: 18px
   &__box
      display: flex
      flex-direction: column
      align-items: center
      justify-content: space-between
      img
         width: 40%
         height: 120px
   &__desc--pink
      color: $primaryPink

@include useMinWidth(580px)
   .glory
      &__desc
         font-size: 20px
      &__box
         img
            width: 30%

@include useMinWidth(800px)
   .glory
      grid-gap: 6px
      grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr)
      &__desc
         font-size: 18px
      &__box
         img
            width: 40%

@include useMinWidth(900px)
   .glory
      padding: spacing(16) spacing(4)
      &__desc
         font-size: 20px
sources.styles\\projects.sass:
.projects
   &__header
      font-size: 46px
      margin: 120px 0 0 0
   &__desc
      font-size: 20px
      color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.56)
      margin-bottom: 53px
   .card
      &__item
         box-shadow: 1px 3px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.33)
      &__btn
         @include primaryButton
         width: 90px
         height: 34px
         border-radius: 4px
         margin-bottom: 8px
      &__header
         color: black
         font-size: 20px
      &__desc
         color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.53)
      &__list
         display: grid
         grid-gap: 30px
         @include useMinWidth(700px)
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr)
            grid-template-rows: 1fr
      &__img
         width: 100%
         height: 180px
         object-fit: cover
      &__header,  &__desc,  &__btn
         margin-left: 16px
sources.styles\\contact.sass:
.contact
   background: #F3F3F3
   padding: 100px 30px
   &__header
      font-size: 34px
      margin: 0 0 22px 0
      color: rgba(0,0,0)
      &::after
         content: ''
         display: block
         margin-top: 16px
         width: 100px
         height: 2px
         background: #7F00FF
         background: -webkit-linear-gradient(to left, #E100FF, #7F00FF)
         background: linear-gradient(to left, #E100FF, #7F00FF)
   &__desc
      font-size: 18px
      color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.67)
      line-height: 133.8%
      margin-bottom: 53px
   &__inp
      display: block
      border: 1px solid #B6B6B6
      max-width: 306px
      max-height: 42px
      min-width: 200px
      min-height: 42px
      width: 100%
      margin-bottom: 38px + 19px
      outline-color: #E100FF
   &__inp-wrp
      position: relative
      input
         padding: 0 8px
      label
         position: absolute
         top: -22px
         left: spacing(1)
   &__btn
      width: 99px
      height: 43px
      display: block
      margin: 35px auto
      font-size: 16px
      cursor: pointer
      @include primaryButton
   &__policy-wrp
      color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.53)
      font-size: 15px
   &__checkbox
      background: white
   &__textarea
      height: 100px
      max-height: 150px
      padding: 8px
      resize: both

   @include useMinWidth(735px)
      &__wrp
         display: flex
         margin: 0 auto
         max-width: 80%
      &__info
         margin-right: 120px
      &__inp
         max-width: 200px
         width: 200px  
         margin-right: 0
      &__form
         margin-top: 22px
         width: 348px
         max-width: 348px
   @include useMinWidth(900px)
      &__inp       
         max-width: 348px
         width: 348px
      &__wrp
         max-width: 60%
